channel.title: Can someone help me fix this error?
channel.description:
Hey guys, IDK what this error means and idk why I got it but here it is 0.0
src\server\model\players\packets\ClickingButtons.java:1963: local variable c is accessed from within inner class; needs to be declared final if(System.currentTimeMillis() - c.duelDelay > 800 && c.duelCount > 0) { ^ src\server\model\players\packets\ClickingButtons.java:1963: local variable c is accessed from within inner class; needs to be declared final if(System.currentTimeMillis() - c.duelDelay > 800 && c.duelCount > 0) { ^ src\server\model\players\packets\ClickingButtons.java:1964: local variable c is accessed from within inner class; needs to be declared final if(c.duelCount != 1) { ^ src\server\model\players\packets\ClickingButtons.java:1965: local variable c is accessed from within inner class; needs to be declared final c.forcedChat(""+ (--c.duelCount)); ^ src\server\model\players\packets\ClickingButtons.java:1965: local variable c is accessed from within inner class; needs to be declared final c.forcedChat(""+ (--c.duelCount)); ^ src\server\model\players\packets\ClickingButtons.java:1966: local variable c is accessed from within inner class; needs to be declared final c.duelDelay = Sy stem.currentTimeMillis(); ^ src\server\model\players\packets\ClickingButtons.java:1968: local variable c is accessed from within inner class; needs to be declared final c.damageTaken = new int[Config.MAX_PLAYERS]; ^ src\server\model\players\packets\ClickingButtons.java:1969: local variable c is accessed from within inner class; needs to be declared final c.forcedChat("FI GHT!"); ^ src\server\model\players\packets\ClickingButtons.java:1970: local variable c is accessed from within inner class; needs to be declared final c.duelCount = 0; ^ src\server\model\players\packets\ClickingButtons.java:1973: local variable c is accessed from within inner class; needs to be declared final if (c.duelCount == 0) { ^ Note: Some input files use unchecked or unsafe operations. Note: Recompile with -Xlint:unchecked for details. 10 errors Press any key to continue . . .
